resources.string: Version 1.0 - Follow the \'Add Entry\' Button to add a gasoline purchase. Follow the \'View Entries\' to display a list of all entries by date. Clicking on the date will bring up details about that entry. From this screen you may delete entries. Follow the \'View Statistics\' to observe the average gasoline purchase and price for the dataset

How to use the app: 
 -Add a food item with the bottom button, then enter the name and a numerical value for the other fields. hit done to add the item 
 -To edit an item click on the item in the list view to open a fragment containing the previuosly entered information and edit as you wish. Hit edit to confirm changes. 
 -To delete an item click on the item in the list view and click on the delete button to remove it
oops forgot to name the item
1. Select an activity from the list.
2. Type the number of minutes completed(Numbers only)
3. Type a comment you may wan to save.
4. Press the Enter Button to save the data
5. Press see all activities to see the list view of all activities completed. You can click on the activity to delete or modify.
4. Press compare button to compare the amount of minutes by month
Do you want to delete this rule?

Instructions: Press ADD NEW SETTING to start creating a new temperature setting. Options for your new setting will appear. Select the time of day, day of the week, and temperature. When you are ready, press SAVE AS NEW. The new temperature setting will appear in the list. You can click on any setting in the list to see the options again. You can make any changes and save them by pressing SAVE, or press SAVE AS NEW to create another new setting. You can Also press DELETE, to delete the setting from the list.
